attributes.visState: {"title":"Ceph Cluster disk usage gauge [Platform Monitoring]","type":"metrics","params":{"axis_formatter":"number","axis_position":"left","filter":{"query":"name:ceph.*","language":"lucene"},"gauge_color_rules":[{"id":"7af44150-6f1e-11e8-83b5-6113cd1545a0"}],"gauge_inner_width":10,"gauge_max":"1","gauge_style":"half","gauge_width":10,"id":"61ca57f0-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417","index_pattern":"platform-monitoring-current","interval":"1h","series":[{"axis_position":"right","chart_type":"line","color":"#68BC00","fill":0.5,"formatter":"percent","id":"61ca57f1-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417","label":"Cluster disk usage","line_width":1,"metrics":[{"field":"ceph.cluster.pgmap.bytes_total","id":"61ca57f2-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417","type":"max"},{"field":"ceph.cluster.pgmap.bytes_used","id":"6ef9e710-6f23-11e8-83b5-6113cd1545a0","type":"max"},{"id":"950ee540-6f23-11e8-83b5-6113cd1545a0","script":"params.Used  / params.Total ","type":"calculation","variables":[{"field":"6ef9e710-6f23-11e8-83b5-6113cd1545a0","id":"9a8731d0-6f23-11e8-83b5-6113cd1545a0","name":"Used"},{"field":"61ca57f2-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417","id":"a2f23180-6f23-11e8-83b5-6113cd1545a0","name":"Total"}]}],"point_size":1,"seperate_axis":0,"split_mode":"everything","stacked":"none","terms_field":"ceph.cluster.name"}],"show_grid":1,"show_legend":1,"time_field":"@timestamp","type":"gauge","drop_last_bucket":0},"aggs":[]}

attributes.visState: {"title":"Ceph misplaced cluster objects count [Platform Monitoring]","type":"metrics","params":{"id":"61ca57f0-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417","type":"metric","series":[{"id":"5d39e6a0-70b4-11e8-bafe-bbb4ac08e219","color":"#68BC00","split_mode":"everything","metrics":[{"id":"5d39e6a1-70b4-11e8-bafe-bbb4ac08e219","type":"max","field":"ceph.cluster.pgs_stats_sum.num_objects_misplaced"}],"seperate_axis":0,"axis_position":"right","formatter":"number","chart_type":"line","line_width":1,"point_size":1,"fill":0.5,"stacked":"none","label":"Misplaced  objects"},{"id":"61ca57f1-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417","color":"#68BC00","split_mode":"everything","metrics":[{"id":"3dd789c0-70b4-11e8-bafe-bbb4ac08e219","type":"max","field":"ceph.cluster.pgs_stats_sum.num_objects_misplaced"},{"id":"42e813d0-70b4-11e8-bafe-bbb4ac08e219","type":"max","field":"ceph.cluster.pgs_stats_sum.num_objects"},{"script":"","id":"4f8c5060-70b4-11e8-bafe-bbb4ac08e219","type":"calculation","variables":[{"id":"517c3980-70b4-11e8-bafe-bbb4ac08e219","name":"total","field":"61ca57f2-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417"}]}],"seperate_axis":0,"axis_position":"right","formatter":"percent","chart_type":"line","line_width":1,"point_size":1,"fill":0.5,"stacked":"none","label":" ","value_template":"{{value}} of all objects"}],"time_field":"@timestamp","index_pattern":"platform-monitoring-current","interval":"1y","axis_position":"left","axis_formatter":"number","show_legend":1,"show_grid":1,"bar_color_rules":[{"id":"dfde5810-6f8e-11e8-a47e-7b48fae8ad69"}],"background_color_rules":[{"value":0,"id":"e11bba10-6f8e-11e8-a47e-7b48fae8ad69","opperator":"gt","background_color":"rgba(226,115,0,1)"},{"value":0,"id":"38e8afa0-6f8f-11e8-a47e-7b48fae8ad69","opperator":"lte","background_color":"rgba(49,117,31,1)"}],"drop_last_bucket":0,"filter":""},"aggs":[]}

attributes.visState: {"title":"Ceph missing cluster objects count [Platform Monitoring]","type":"metrics","params":{"id":"61ca57f0-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417","type":"metric","series":[{"id":"61ca57f1-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417","color":"#68BC00","split_mode":"everything","metrics":[{"id":"61ca57f2-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417","type":"max","field":"ceph.cluster.pgs_stats_sum.num_objects_missing"}],"seperate_axis":0,"axis_position":"right","formatter":"number","chart_type":"line","line_width":1,"point_size":1,"fill":0.5,"stacked":"none","label":"Missing  objects"},{"id":"8c974c30-70b4-11e8-bafe-bbb4ac08e219","color":"#68BC00","split_mode":"everything","metrics":[{"id":"8c974c31-70b4-11e8-bafe-bbb4ac08e219","type":"max","field":"ceph.cluster.pgs_stats_sum.num_objects_missing"},{"id":"9677add0-70b4-11e8-bafe-bbb4ac08e219","type":"max","field":"ceph.cluster.pgs_stats_sum.num_objects"},{"script":"params.missing / params.total","id":"a4e315d0-70b4-11e8-bafe-bbb4ac08e219","type":"calculation","variables":[{"id":"b4a55b40-70b4-11e8-bafe-bbb4ac08e219","name":"missing","field":"8c974c31-70b4-11e8-bafe-bbb4ac08e219"},{"id":"bfaf21b0-70b4-11e8-bafe-bbb4ac08e219","name":"total","field":"9677add0-70b4-11e8-bafe-bbb4ac08e219"}]}],"seperate_axis":0,"axis_position":"right","formatter":"percent","chart_type":"line","line_width":1,"point_size":1,"fill":0.5,"stacked":"none","label":" ","value_template":"{{value}} of all objects"}],"time_field":"@timestamp","index_pattern":"platform-monitoring-current","interval":"auto","axis_position":"left","axis_formatter":"number","show_legend":1,"show_grid":1,"bar_color_rules":[{"id":"dfde5810-6f8e-11e8-a47e-7b48fae8ad69"}],"background_color_rules":[{"value":0,"id":"e11bba10-6f8e-11e8-a47e-7b48fae8ad69","opperator":"gt","background_color":"rgba(218,31,31,1)"},{"value":0,"id":"38e8afa0-6f8f-11e8-a47e-7b48fae8ad69","opperator":"lte","background_color":"rgba(49,117,31,1)"}],"drop_last_bucket":0,"filter":""},"aggs":[]}

attributes.visState: {"title":"Ceph OSDs down metric [Platform Monitoring]","type":"metrics","params":{"id":"61ca57f0-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417","type":"metric","series":[{"id":"61ca57f1-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417","color":"#68BC00","split_mode":"everything","metrics":[{"id":"61ca57f2-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417","type":"count"}],"seperate_axis":0,"axis_position":"right","formatter":"number","chart_type":"line","line_width":1,"point_size":1,"fill":0.5,"stacked":"none","label":"DOWN OSDs","filter":{"query":"NOT ceph.osd.status:up","language":"lucene"}},{"id":"f3febc40-70a6-11e8-bafe-bbb4ac08e219","color":"#68BC00","split_mode":"everything","metrics":[{"id":"f3febc41-70a6-11e8-bafe-bbb4ac08e219","type":"count"}],"seperate_axis":0,"axis_position":"right","formatter":"number","chart_type":"line","line_width":1,"point_size":1,"fill":0.5,"stacked":"none","label":"on a total of"}],"time_field":"@timestamp","index_pattern":"platform-monitoring-current","interval":"1y","axis_position":"left","axis_formatter":"number","show_legend":1,"show_grid":1,"background_color_rules":[{"value":0,"id":"bebb7b40-70a6-11e8-bafe-bbb4ac08e219","background_color":"rgba(218,31,31,1)","opperator":"gt"},{"value":0,"id":"4d141050-70a7-11e8-bafe-bbb4ac08e219","background_color":"rgba(49,117,31,1)","opperator":"lte"}],"filter":{"query":"name:ceph.osd","language":"lucene"},"drop_last_bucket":0},"aggs":[]}

attributes.visState: {"title":"Ceph max used OSD Pct [Platform Monitoring]","type":"metrics","params":{"id":"61ca57f0-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417","type":"metric","series":[{"id":"61ca57f1-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417","color":"#68BC00","split_mode":"everything","metrics":[{"id":"61ca57f2-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417","type":"max","field":"ceph.osd.utilization"}],"seperate_axis":0,"axis_position":"right","formatter":"number","chart_type":"line","line_width":1,"point_size":1,"fill":0.5,"stacked":"none","label":"Max used OSD","value_template":"{{value}} %"},{"id":"8c974c30-70b4-11e8-bafe-bbb4ac08e219","color":"#68BC00","split_mode":"everything","metrics":[{"id":"8c974c31-70b4-11e8-bafe-bbb4ac08e219","type":"avg","field":"ceph.osd.utilization"}],"seperate_axis":0,"axis_position":"right","formatter":"number","chart_type":"line","line_width":1,"point_size":1,"fill":0.5,"stacked":"none","label":"average ","value_template":"{{value}} % for all OSDs"}],"time_field":"@timestamp","index_pattern":"platform-monitoring-current","interval":"5m","axis_position":"left","axis_formatter":"number","show_legend":1,"show_grid":1,"bar_color_rules":[{"id":"dfde5810-6f8e-11e8-a47e-7b48fae8ad69"}],"background_color_rules":[{"value":80,"id":"38e8afa0-6f8f-11e8-a47e-7b48fae8ad69","opperator":"lte","background_color":"rgba(49,117,31,1)"},{"value":80,"id":"d207e920-70b7-11e8-bafe-bbb4ac08e219","background_color":"rgba(252,196,0,1)","opperator":"gt"},{"value":90,"id":"f52a5b40-70b7-11e8-bafe-bbb4ac08e219","background_color":"rgba(218,31,31,1)","opperator":"gt"}],"drop_last_bucket":0,"filter":{"query":"name:ceph.osd","language":"lucene"}},"aggs":[]}
